description: This deluxe reissue features 20-bit remastering from the original master tape and enhanced packaging faithful to the original album release. Track listing: "Blackout," "Can't Live Without You," "No One Like You," "You Give Me All I Need," "Now!," "Dynamite," "Arizona," "China White" and "When the Smoke Is Going Down."
